resources.string:
You have three ways how to set the wallpaper

Use the ”Set Wallpaper” button below.

or

Standard Method:
1. On any home-screen, place a finger on the display and long press.
2. From the menu that pops up, select ”Wallpapers.” (on Android 2.*)
3. From here, select ”Live Wallpapers” to see the list of installed live wallpapers.
4. You can select each one to see a preview of how it will look like on your device.
5. If you like what you see, hit ”Set Wallpaper.”

or

Alternative Method:
1. First, head into the Settings menu of your device.
2. From there, select “Display.”
3. Under Display, you will see an option for “Wallpaper.” Select it.
4. From there, follow Steps 3 to 5 on the Standard Method.
